attributes.action: stop robbing us blind with tax!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every single item we purchase has VAT on it. All our utility bills have VAT added to them. We pay tax for our cars and tax on petrol.
We pay income tax on our earnings. 
The only thing you haven't taxed us for yet is the air we breathe. 
Could you stop taxing us so much please?
Thank you

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on tax:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
